channel.title: Shanghai on EICP-LAB
channel.description: Recent content in Shanghai on EICP-LAB

item.title: The 4th CAERE Conference
item.description: PhD student Zhenhuan Yang was invited to present his research titled “Raining on Bond: The Impact of Extreme Rainfall on Local Financing Costs,” co-authored with Professor Yangsiyu Lu, at the 4th Annual Conference of the Chinese Association of Environmental and Resource Economists (CAERE), held on May 17–18 and hosted by the Shanghai University of Finance and Economics.
